amendatorysection.catchline: Trustees; bond; terms; approval; filing; fee; cost paid by association.
amendatorysection.para: Whenever the trustees of any cemetery association organized under sections 12-501 to 12-505 shall receive the gift of any property, real or personal, in their own name, in trust, for the perpetual care of said cemetery, or anything connected therewith, said trustees shall, upon the enactment of bylaws to that effect by the association, give a bond to said association of at least one thousand dollars, conditioned for the faithful administration of said trust and care of said funds and property. Said bond shall be filed with, and approved by the county clerk of the county wherein said association is located, and the clerk shall be paid the same fee for approving and filing said bond as is now fixed by law for approving and filing official bonds. The cost of said bond shall be paid by said cemetery association.
